Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by its external look, people praising this movie haven't realised that. The biggest mistake to me is that : parody or not, this movie has taken a good topic and turn in something we've seen a million of times. Read previous reviews and understand that I criticized. What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy fliers have long since left Planet Earth, for adventures in the Saved Galaxy. They left behind the stowaway brilliant inventor (Spankalu). He designed and built 'The Mine Counter Miner' (T.M.C. Mimer), a machine to analyze and remove the radioactive mine counter

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is going to be criticized by some because it has very little action in it, which is somewhat true. However there are some very funny moments here and some really entertaining scenes and it is acted well enough that you can suspend disbelief and enjoy it for what it is, a humorous excursion.
